text: يوفون بالنذر ويخافون يوما كان شره مستطيرا

translations.translation: They fulfil their vows and fear a Day whose evil will spread far and wide.
Those who fulfil their vows and fear the Day whose evil shall be diffused far and wide,
These will be the ones who fulfil their vows and dread the Day whose woe shall be spread far and wide;
The servants of God fulfill their vows and are afraid of the day in which there will be widespread terror.
They fulfil their pledges, and fear a day the evil of which is widespread.
They fulfill (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil will be wide-spreading.
They fulfill vows and fear a day the evil of which shall be spreading far and wide.
They fulfil their vows, and fear a day whose evil is upon the wing;
(Because) they perform the vow and fear a day whereof the evil is wide-spreading,
They keep their vows and fear a day the woe of which will spread far and wide;
They fulfill their vow and dread a Day the evil whereof shall be widespreading.
They fulfill their vows and fear a day whose ill will be widespread.
They perform (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.
They (are those who) fulfill (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil will be wide-spreading.
they who keep their vows and fear a Day whose evil is spread;
They fulfill their vows, and dread a Day whose ill is widespread.
They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
[76:7] They fulfil their vows, [pledged] in obedience to God, and fear a day the evil of which will be widespread.

Allah then described their traits when they were in the life of the world, saying: (Because they perform the vow) because they fulfil their pledges and oath by Allah; it is also said this means: they perform the obligations (and fear a day) and fear the torment of a day (whereof the evil) the torment (is wide spreading,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ } معناه بمَا نَذرُوا مِن طَاعةِ الله وحَقِّهِ { وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْماً كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيراً } معناه فَاشٍ

translations.translation: And His saying, {They will fulfill their vow} means, according to what they vowed of obedience to Allah and His right {And they fear a day whose evil is widespread}, meaning great.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وصاروا من كمال وصولهم واتصالهم { يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ } ويوفرون على المنذور { وَ } كيف لا يوفون أولئك الموفقون
 مع أنهم { يَخَافُونَ يَوْماً } وأيّ يوم
 يوماً { كَانَ شَرُّهُ } شدائده وأهواله { مُسْتَطِيراً } [الإنسان: 7] طائراً منتشراً بين عموم العباد؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { يُوفُون بالنَّدْرٍ } بما أَوجبوا على أنفسهم من الطاعات، وهو استئناف مسوق لبيان ما لأجله رُزقوا ما ذكر من النعيم، كأنه قيل: ماذا كانوا يفعلون حتى نالوا تلك الرتبة العالية؟ فقال: يُوفون بما أوجبوا على أنفسهم، فكيف بما أوجبه اللهُ عليهم؟ { ويخافون يوماً كان شَرُّه } شدائده أو عذابه { مُسْتَطِيراً } منتشراً فاشياً في أقطار الأرض غاية الانتشار، من: استطار الفجر: انتشر
